category-def.name: org.codehaus.groovy.eclipse.sdk
category-def.label: Groovy Eclipse SDK (Optional)
category-def.description: Optional feature that provides source code for the Groovy-Eclipse plugin

category-def.name: org.codehaus.groovy.eclipse
category-def.label: Groovy-Eclipse
category-def.description: The features that provide Groovy support for Eclipse. If you are looking for for the Groovy Compiler features or the JDT core patch feature, *deselect* Group Items by Category. These sub-features are automatically included in the main Groovy-Eclipse feature, but can be installed stand-alone if required.
